DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the safety and efficacy of the Glaukos® Suprachoroidal Stent Model G3 in conjunction with cataract surgery, compared to cataract surgery only, in subjects with mild to moderate primary open-angle glaucoma.
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Investigation of the Glaukos® Suprachoroidal Stent Model G3 In Conjunction With Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This is an IDE trial to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the Glaukos® Suprachoroidal Stent Model G3 (hereinafter referred to as G3) in conjunction with cataract surgery, compared to cataract surgery only, in subjects with mild to moderate primary open-angle glaucoma.
DOC.criteria: Mild to moderate openangle glaucoma Characteristics consistent with mild to moderate glaucoma Use of one (1) to three (3) medications at time of screening exam Pigmentary or pseudoexfoliative glaucoma Prior incisional glaucoma surgery
